Use the following generation settings:

Tone: Write in a neutral, information-focused tone.Mild emphasis is allowed to clarify relevance, but avoid emotional language, exaggeration, or persuasive phrasing.The tone should remain calm and descriptive.

generated_body: The article is likely to provide details regarding the discovery of the vehicle belonging to a Marine suspected in a Virginia slaying, which has been located in South Carolina. Readers can expect an overview of the investigation, including insights into how the authorities connected the vehicle to the case and any relevant background information on the Marine. The article may also touch on the implications of this find for the ongoing investigation and possibly include statements from law enforcement officials or experts in criminal cases.
